fif_core

Class Descriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fif_core.Descriptor

  • public class Descriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides implementation and methods of an descriptor.

    One descriptor has a set of metadata of one resource and can't have more than one metadata with the same attribute.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Troiano Lorenzo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Descriptor

        public Descriptor()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllMetadata

        public java.util.AbstractList<Metadata> getAllMetadata()
        Returns an abstract list containing all the metadata of this descriptor.

        You can modify internal state of the descriptor calling this method and then calling add/remove etc. methods of the abstract list.

        Postconditions:

        1-It's returned an abstract list containing all the metadata of this descriptor.

        Returns:
        an abstract list containing all the metadata of this descriptor.

      • getMetadata

        public Metadata getMetadata(java.lang.String s)
        Returns a metadata that has the specific attribute.

        Postconditions:

        1-It's returned the metadata if it's found a metadata with that attribute or null if there are not metadata with that attribute.
        Returns:
        the metadata that has the specific attribute.

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(java.util.ArrayList<Metadata> meta)
                 throws MetadataWithSameAttributeException
        Throws:
        MetadataWithSameAttributeException

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(Metadata... meta)
                 throws MetadataWithSameAttributeException
        Sets a list of metadata for the current descriptor.

        You can set a variable numbers of metadata.

        Preconditions:

        1-None of the metadata must be null.
        2-Can't be set two or more metadata with the same attribute.

        Postconditions:

        1-All the metadata are set in the descriptor correctly.

        Parameters:
        meta - The list of metadata value you want to set.
        Throws:
        MetadataWithSameAttributeException - if at least two metadata have the same attribute.
